aka: Fatally Injured by Love of Life

cast.name: 维尔吉尔·安德里埃斯库 Virgil Andriescu
克劳迪乌·布莱翁茨 Claudiu Bleonț

director.name: 米尔恰·韦罗尤 Mircea Veroiu

this_title: Să mori rănit din dragoste de viaţă
trans_title: Fatally Injured by Love of Life
introduction: The film presents the life and death story "of the love of life" of two young Communist lawyers during the economic crisis of the 1930s and the evolution of Romania's political life towards fascism . They undertake a sabotage action on a Romanian-German armaments factory and then release a party leader who was arrested by State Security during a labor strike in Galati port .
foreign_title: Să mori rănit din dragoste de viaţă
